value.name: Senate confirms Maj. Gen. Robert Miller as next Air Force Surgeon General
value.description: The U.S. Senate confirmed Maj. Gen. Robert I. Miller as the U.S. Air Force and Space Force’s next Surgeon General May 26. The Senate Armed Services Committee confirmed Miller by voice vote.

about.name: Surgeon General of the United States Air Force

value.name: Pvt Robert Miller McTureous
value.description: Alert and ready for any hostile counteraction following his company's seizure of an important hill objective, Private Robert Miller McTureous was quick to observe the plight of company stretcher bearers who were suddenly assailed by slashing machinegun fire as they attempted to evacuate wounded at the rear of the newly won position.

value.name: Lawsuit: Barnstable police negligence led to death of man suffering mental health crisis
value.description: A federal lawsuit alleges Barnstable police used the same maneuver on Hyannis resident Robert Miller that NYC police used to subdue Eric Garner.

value.name: Police arrest 'Mayhem' on vehicle theft charges
value.description: A warrant was issued, and deputies arrested Robert Miller on Tuesday. He was charged with Theft over $2,500 and under $30,000. His bond was set at $2,500 by a judge.
